title: Land Without Bread
brief_description: A surrealistic documentary portrait of the region of Las Hurdes, a remote region of Spain where civilisation has barely developed, showing how the local peasants try to survive without even the most basic utilities and skills.

constellations_other.name: Reconstructing reality
constellations_other.description: While documentary pertains to be about the truth, many filmmakers and artists have used ingenious reconstructions to represent an abstracted honesty.

description: An exploration —manipulated and staged— of life in Las Hurdes, in the province of Cáceres, in Extremadura, Spain, as it was in 1932. Insalubrity, misery and lack of opportunities provoke the emigration of young people and the solitude of those who remain in the desolation of one of the poorest and least developed Spanish regions at that time. (Silent short, voiced in 1937 and 1996.)
